attributes.title: DO NOT GET BUNKER BOYS APP😡
attributes.review: this app is terrible! it was extremely glitchy and i got a million spam calls! i do not recommend cheetos app😤. I really wish i could give 0 stars but i can’t😾. thank you for reading my review😼

attributes.title: Black and Hispanic lives matter
attributes.review: When I first opened the app it said “keep America great”, and I’m mad because all he is trying making America worse, and that’s all I got to say.

attributes.title: DUMB APP!!
attributes.review: This is The worst app to ever be created! I hate it so much!! There is no good quality in any of it. Trump is a terrible person anyway. This app is so terrible I told everyone I know to never download it ever!! I hate it.I hate it.

attributes.title: Trump ugly
attributes.review: This app is so bad, it first took foreva to load, then it started to glitch outta no where, n then right after that I started seeing a odd ugly orange face on my screen yeah it’s terrible it ain’t worth your time 🕺🏿

attributes.title: Absolutely horrible
attributes.review: Why would you get a app that glitches 24/7 and won’t let you click on anything

attributes.title: Bad app
attributes.review: This app is terrible don’t like it it kept glitching out and would spam me with notifications that had nothing to do with what I believe in do not download

attributes.title: BAD APP
attributes.review: This is one of the worst apps i have ever seen. I downloaded it and immediately threw up profusely. I can not believe that this orange idiot would go anywhere in life past store manager. President???? No that can’t be real.

attributes.title: Garbage App!!!
attributes.review: This is the WORST app I have ever tried to download. It took up way too much space and took WEEKS to download. The interface is so bad. There’s no way any sane person can use this app

attributes.title: Awful App
attributes.review: This is the worst app ever!!!! Not only was it laggy, every time I opened the app there would be a dick pick there. Someone then cane to my house that was apart of the Trump app and peed in my pool. Worst experience ever please don’t get this app.

attributes.title: bad quality
attributes.review:
it makes my phone glitch and i couldnt close out of it for weeks, Wayy to many adds. i would never recommend this to anyone.
